House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00022
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROMOTING CONSUMER PROTECTION ON THE PURCHASE OF MOBILE COMMUNICATION DEVICES BY ALLOWING CONSUMERS TO UNLOCK THE MOBILE WIRELESS DEVICES PRIOR TO THE EXPIRATION OF THE LOCK-IN PERIOD UNDER THE MOBILE COMMUNICATION SERVICE CONTRACT
SHORT TITLE : Consumer Protection On Mobile Communication Service Contract
ABSTRACT : Seeks to allow mobile phone and data service consumers to request for the unlocking of their devices, for free, or for a reasonable fee, thus having a more dynamic marketplace as a result of promoting consumer choice and wireless competition.
